title: Rekenlogboek
description: The rekenlogboek is an app that helps teachers to keep track of the progress students make with maths. Students fill in their logbooks on Microsoft Teams and teachers can see what their students filled in.
stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js, Socket.io, Sass

title: Quizzer
description: The quizzer is a project where the goal was to make a pub quiz. It consists of 3 apps (the quiz master, the team(s) and the scoreboard) and a server. The quiz master chooses questions, the teams answer the questions and the scoreboard displays the results.
stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js, ws, Sass

title: Eenmaal Andermaal
description: Eenmaal Andermaal is an auction website. People can search for auctions in a lot of different categories and make a bid.

title: Personal website
description: This is the website you're currently looking at. Out of all projects I'm the most proud of this one, because I created this one all by myself from scratch.
